Blog.post: Yoz..i m freakin tired now ok..came back at 8 frm dat dumb syf..ok lemme tell u todae wad happened..eventful day..first woke up was raining cats n dogs..i heard barkin all...ANYWAY...decided to take cab wif hpyo camillus n clarence..den i cldnt find them i told hpyo paing meet me somewhere he meet somewhere else..stupid guy..den we waited all d way until 7.20 for a cab to come all empty bt dun wan take us wan..den we decided to take 275 to st theresa dere n take cab..we got a cab..N MY UNCLE WAS D DRIVER!!! cldnt believe it i dun realli like him so i din tok to him lucki he nv notice sial..den go skool although we were late nv kena nethn raining mah..den syf take bus there den irritatin sial wait so long den whn it finally started d dumb choir took up almost half d show..betta we all come after d choir sing rite..so mani songs..give up den i hpyo paing n alex disturbin felicia n shuting like siao dey nthn betta to do laugh like siao..den i saw an ugly piece of human female shit there...den do d flashcards all den saw mani buns flying ard..get it?? BUNS FLYIN ARD...den alex tok alot of crap along wif me..den coming hm time powder lar d skool all no lights den all like camping lidat..very nice..den take d dumb bus hm n here i m..cya tml

ZZup...2nd day back in skool...tired lar....first get down frm the bus got dunno wad kind of rain sial so much den my dumb umbrella so pathetic cldnt proivde shelter at all den all my socks all wet...den go skool i go to toilet try to dry it den so dirrty sial den decided to buy new one..haha..den pe time siao sial mr limbun ask us to run cross country..stupid sial passin time 20 min muz run 7 rd ard d 2.4 track..i passed!!18.27..den whole day my legs aching sial..especially my calf..like netime can get cram..which always occur to me..den after skool go for eldds lar den dat side also i damn tired nv tok much den came hm walkin dwn d stairs almost kena cram..straightened my leg in time..i dunno y d heck my dumb legs so prone to crams ah..dumb legs..neway..daz abt it..i so bored now sial oni a pathetic 8 ppl online..CiAoZ

YO i m back..okay todae is goin to b a relatively long post for ytd n todae as mani things haf happened in dis two days..ok first i will start wif ytd...okay so ytd was sunday woke up n find all d dumb books preparing to go to skool denard 5 o clock went to chinatown pt to belanja my bro for his bday..den at d bustop one guy fainted..dere was another guy there lar..den he was alone no one help..cos basically no one was dere except me n my family..so we went to help n I HAD TO SACRIFICE MY DUMB BOTTLE..bt can get new one..hehe cos dat guy looks drunk n u nv noe wad dey drink n come..hw kind can i get? anyway my mom advised him to take a cab to whereva he wanted to go bt he nv listen..mayb no money den he climbed d same bus as me..ok so two stops later he gt dwn...bt..whn the bus was moving off i dunno wad got into him he ran back n bang d exit door..so d driver had no choice go open d door..d guy climbed back on tap his ez link card n ran away..hw dumb...siao asshole..n after dat go svenssons..shiok man..den go tuition n came hm..n now for todae....okay so today woke up at 6.00..no big diff for me cos in d holidays also i kept on wakin up so earli..so woke up den went to skool..good to c everyone back man..all d cheerful faces n as usual i vinod ari all tokin cock lar..n kinonn cldnt tok cos he gt sore throat..wad a relief to all d teachers..gt our timetable saw my new science teacher..den dnt period boshu keep pesterin me sial..act act say her father work as karanguni n mother as road sweeper..LAME/CORNY..den after dat go for soccer briefing mr aznan very disappointed cos alot of them nv come for d holiday trng..den talk talk talk den came hm went down n play soccer like siao now all my legs aching..neway i tink dis is getting too long..CiAoZ..

zzup..2dae woke up at 8.30 started doing my punjabi hmwrk cos 2dae punjabi skool started after a 6 week break...last min do bt managed to finish..lucki...den go there din noe can b so fun after all..all my dumb classmates so funni ah whack each other all play armwrestling all...den d other sec 2 class oni gt a pathetic 5 ppl come..dunno do wad lar den...my class solid lar disturb each other all...toking crap thruout d whole day..den came hm den went for tuition den came hm gt nthn to do den now here i m...cant believe france lost....france out eng out spain out germany out italy out..wad is d euro comin to man...hu gonna win? dun tell me greece...u nv noe ok dey beat d european champs...haiz...dunno lar..euro is in doubt..NiTeZ

hi..haf been doin homewrk d whole day finally get some rest..england rox..beckham rox even more man third penalty miss in a row..pro man i dunno how he can whack d penalties so high...hw good...so dumb man vassell another idiot dunno hw come suddenly he so useless man..cpt leading d team by example man beckham...tml back to punjabi skool..how sad for me..today france gonna win man...dey rox...skool reopening soon n i m rushin on my hmwrk sure all my classmates r too cos we r all slackers..haha neway..gtg.CiAoZ n FrAnCe Gonna win ENGLAND "ROX" too...

HeYYo....zzzup i m back....went for d dumb syf rehearsal todae its realli a waste of my time..bt at least can get 2 cca pts lar...bt nt as if i dun haf enuff..OOPPS letting out too muchh there...neway met hpyo at d busstop at abt 11 den took d dumb bus to skool den reach was quite late all seated in d hall readi den Limbun dey all give out all our snacks which we supposed to consume at d stadium-BUNS- haha second time in a row seh....he juz luvs buns too much lar..den toook d bus to d stadium den went to get seated at least todae d sun nt as killer as tuesday den we got a higher seat..betta also lar...den i broke the frame 3 times leh..dunno wad i was doing..too ruff i guess..den i tink d student leaders also give up on me lar..den d break time all go toilet d freakin toilet so damn blooody dark no lights at all sial...nonsensical toilet...den go back for d second round den finish readi took the bus back to skool den frm there go to tiong eat dinner wif syed vinod hpyo n fazly eat MAC....den went home reach abt 8.45 la den daz all lar i gonna finish my dumb hmwrk tomorrow bt b4 dat gonna catch eng match todae..quarter final everyone muz c ah..HU U TINK WILL WIN?? lez see...

heyy nv blog ytd cos was too damn tired ok..so i will blog todae abt ytd since todae i m bloggin v earli...ok ytd woke up at 6.00 muz b in skool by 7.00 cos muz put my soccer stuff in skool cos after d syf thnggy gt soccer wad..so put it in den line up all den took bus to d national stadium...go there take all our things all den ard 10.30 became so damn hot man den ari sitting beside me i readi sweatin like dunno wad dyein down dere he keep askin me his hair meltin anot cos he put wax..his hair more important or me being dehydrated/? den he like care more abt his hair den all of us being burnt man...neway we were cursin d instructor like duno wad lidat sial..all damn freakin drained out thx to the sun man..killer sial d sun....untahanerable...den finally we got into shade ari straight ran to the toilet not to cool down bt to make his hair nicer...i was like..alreadi so tired he ask me follow all in d end haf to follow..haha den in d end cooled down also den sat in d bus go back to skool den i found out i forgot to brin my soccer shorts so went back to my house to get it since soccer was oni starting at 2.30 n we were dismissed at 12.30 bt b4 i went home i went to tiong eat ljs first..den went home still xtra time so rest for awhile..den go socccer no field d field still being resurfaced...so had to train at d arena lor...den was so tired whn i came home man..on thursday hope d sun isnt as killer man.i hope it rains ah so no sun....at nite going temple todae n i m FINALLY gonna cut my long long long long hair....CiAoZ

Hi i m back....nv blog for two days ah cos dose two days r d typical holidays so nthn to blog...neway..ytd my cousins came over n stayed overnite here den we play n play like siao den todae we woke up at 7.00 den i n two of my cousins went to henderson secondary for a soccer competition..started at abt 9.15 den we had five matches.....first one drew 0-0 second one won 1-0( i scored) third one drew 1-1( i scored) fourth one drew 0-0 den last game which was d third n fourth placing we won 1-0( i scored AGAIN)..so dat means my whole team is unbeaten den i m d oni n top scorer for d team wif 3 goals..n in d end we won 3rd place for under-13..trophy is nice..dis competition i haf participated 4 times (includin todae) n all also gt win some thn n come hm leh nt bad ah kept the record going today...first time was in p5 we won under 12 champions den p6 we won under 13 3rd place den last yr won under 14 second den dis yr won under 13 3rd..i m totally shacked man dunno wad time gonna k.o todae..CiAoZ

zzup...another typical holiday..boring n slow....haiyo...supposed to do the dumb holiday homewrk today got no mood lar...den nthn to do play xbox all d way until went down to play soccer...although i was sick earlier in d mrng...dis is too much man i m mad...now oni i realize...sick in d mrng now playing soccer bt nv play properly also so fast get tired unlike normal days den witnessed a fight dwnstairs extra la d fella hu started it oni wanna show off got attitude prblm ah....always nt happi..wad can u do? i juz walked away..haha daz called smartness dun get involved..den came home n on d com dwnldin some punjabi songs now..lata gonna catch england n swiss...tml gonna go for el no matter wad so mani times missed readi....daz all for todae d sian dae..nonsense ah..CiAoZ

wazzzup ytd nv blog so today i m back..nv blog cos i went to my cousin's house for a stay over....shiok man....went there abt 3.30 den went for swimming at abt 6.30 all d way until 8.30..shiok ah realli needed dat swim den come back to the hm eat dinner which was abt 9.25 den after dat watch incredible tales n smallville...den ard 11.30 my cousins my bro n i went to bed..BUT...din sleep..we blasted some songs while lying down shiok sial so loud den until 1am nv sleep den in d end we slept..HOWEVA we woke up at 2.45am to watch holland n germany match ...haha shiok ah...den slept back abt 4.45 den woke up in d mrning at 9.30...all damn tired onli had 6 hrs of sleep den dun wanna do nethn at all juz laze ard d house den ate lunch at abt 1pm den went to bathe den go play soccer..bathe den go play soccer funnni rite?....den came back den go bathe AGAIN cos needed to go temple den frm there came home lar...datz it for todae...gonna watch spain n greece soon or izzit portugal n russia? i dunno la bt its one of those matches..cIaOz

zzzupz...woke up earli AGAIN....6.30am...it cant get any worst man....finally tml gt rest man...finally....FRANCE WON MAN THEY ROCK BECKHAM SUX MAN CPT CAN MISS PENALTY SO SHAMEFUl...zidane also cpt bt scored free kick n penalty leh i thought beckham so good at free kicks wad...nonsense oni..todae went to pulau ubin wif eldds peepz....met at tampines mrt lah some of dem so late..give up ah.....haha den go to changi den took d boat across...go there split into two grps hikers n cyclers i went to hikers den onli 8 of us hikin leh den we go halfway all we supposed to take long cut all take short cut ended up at dead end den walk walk walk like nobody business lidat n i dun see anythn dat we get out of dat...den all so tired leh..under d hot sun walk for 3 hrs nonstop..haiz den went back to meetin pt haf some coconuts den came back to sing den d hiker grp went to changi village hawker centre to eat lunch den we all went to tampines juz to find yong liangs cs..hw dumb den dun haf also go tiong also dun haf so ended up at hm..haha tml goin cousins house to stay finally get a break man..yeah! dat is life...kkz..gtg later muz see denmark n italy ah italy gonna win man...haha....although dun realli support them....kkz CIAOZ N FRANCE RAWK ON!!!!

wha kaoz cant believe d dumb portugal lost....AT THEIR OWN HOME LEH..agains greece of all d countries how dumb....wad to do....todae eng n france..i wan france win n i tink they will....today another earli day sial i juz cant find d right day to wake up earli sial woke up 7.30 started doin my dumb tuition hmwrk cos had it at 10...so irritating....den come hm dunno walk ard d house...went down to play soccer at abt 4.30 go there i kena whack on my shin sial again same spot leh its swellin up like mad...haha......dunno wad to do la mayb gonna go watch bend it like beckz now.....noone tokin to me..haiz so it all ends here DUN FORGET TO CATCH FRANCE N ENGLAND AT 2.45AM!!!..ciaoz

whoa todae pwer la woke up ard 9 den prepare for d chalet....haha mr aznan called us there for a belanja......met d whole team at tiong bahru first at 12.30 lidat den dey go buy dunno wad all den go take mrt to pasir ris wad a long journey sial den after dat reach dere go dunno where ard d whole interchange finding d dumb shuttle service whn it was rite infront of us waste time den go there started playing soccer..wad u expect soccer team wad...haha den after dat swam for awhile den go start bbq haha den some of them went to play cs bt the dumb place closed haha.....den played even more soccer...den ard 9.30 left n took the shuttle service back to d pasir ris mrt den we were d oni ones inside so noisy created havoc sial..haha so irritating for d others we nite alreadi so energetic..nt bad huh?...den stupid syed freaked all of us out sial he say he recorded somethn on his fone whn he was in d toilet n say dere was noone at home den he record den in between gt someone laughing den we all here siallah so scary man i tink u hear also cant tahan sial so damn scary den all so scared sial to go home...haha it was for real ok i heard it wif my own ears sial...den reach hm ard now..nt bad ah gonna stay up for euro match portugal gonna win...kkz ciaoz

hulloozz....i am so freakin tired i dunno wad i gonna do....todae woke up 6.45 go soccer..go skool d bloody field closed den wait wait wait for mr aznan den ended up go to the field opposite the school..run ten rounds ard there like dunno wad lidat den do dunno wad physical training like shit lidat...den play game all.. den came home kena headache..SIALLAH dis is d worst headache i haf eva kena..i tink u can nv kena a painer headache...frm 11 to 1 leh i was helpless couldnt do nethn so haf to juz lie dwn and tahan d bloody thing which i almost give up den ard 1 lidat d stupid thing slowly go away..i got kena dis headache b4 bt dis is even painer...haiz wad to do....lata gonna go grandma house n play soccer again sial....duno whether i will anot lar i realli cant tahan anymore readi i m dead tired 4 days in a row no rest..k la dunno wad to say alreadi...Byez

wha kao i m damn tired now gonna b 4 days in a row wake up so earli.....tuesday woke up at 7.45....ytd woke up 6.45 todae woke up 8 tml waking up 6.45..die lar...todae went for idp again....meet at tiong den yixuan say wanna go mcdonald bt in d end she nv eat nethn..how dumb..den took d dumb mrt..stupid alex so irritating...den finally woked d shortcut to bc house today, i give yixuan chance lar....den go his house she started watchin d dumb tv den d rest all play gb i gt nthn to do...den call mr benson lee so long cant get him...den went to gwc.....dunno do wad lar....i finally played bball today after 2 yrs..hahaha nt bad lar..hehe den after dat followed yixuan to gwc AGAIN along wif bc cos dey wanna eat dinner..so earli..oni 6.45 wanna eat dinner...zzzzz....den wait wait wait...wait for d bloody bus so long sial....den go interchange wait for d bus so long AGAIN....haha dats abt it gtg ah tml another long day...

yo peepz....woke up at 6.45 todae all by myself n prepared breakfast all myself..nt bad huh? hehe......went to soccer at 7.45 forgot to bring hanif socks..sorri..hehe den waited n waited for d team we supposed to haf a match wif(khalish frenz) waited for so damn long...nonsense man den finally kicked off...haha we kena whack 7-4..pro sial they...17-18 yrs old leh of course win ah..bully kecik...den i d oni one hu played full game other den colin( some stupid goalie).... so freakin tiring leh...haha den sprained my dumb ankle...n den now my thigh also giving prblms..haiz at nite going temple..finally man after 2 weeks..cant tahan muz go liao...ohya forgot to mention..met wendy at the bm interchange she was rushing for her bus la so cldnt tok to her...tml gt idp again...gonna bring yx one big big round again..haha Juz jkin la give chance readi....kkz...Cya ardz

wazzzzup..today went for idp at bc house all d way at china gardens...met yixuan n marcus at tbp first..first time yixuan earli..thankfully....den take mrt go bc house....get down at china gardens d stupid yixuan say too hot to walk den she n marcus nicely go wait under d bustop tinkin dat i wld take bus wif them bt i kept on walkin n eventually dey folllowed...haha...lazy pigs lil bit sun also cant tahan.... reach there wait for boshu come den bc dog was running abt ah den boshu come d dog went to d door she see it she screamed n ran away...haha ran away leh..how dumb rite.....den we went to eat at d jurong east sports complex eat kfc....stupid yixuan say she very full den we go back bc house started eating again leh...wad a pig...den go back bc house sit ard for awhile den left...bc took his bike down go cycle...i finally cycled a bike after how mani yrs....felt shiok...den go take mrt..marcus dropped off at queenstwn yixuan dropped at redhill n i at tiong......DaTz AlL...CiAoZ

yoz....another same old typical holiday....it cant get any worst...aniwae todae had soccer bt couldnt go cos was having stupid flu....dumb flu...it sux being sick...bt now much betta readi...den supposed to hand in maths file today also neva hand in i tink i gonna die lar...tml gt idp..muz see d dumb yixuan face..hope she doesnt make us late lar...hope la..i tink she will foreva lidat wan la...neway gtg now..too bad for d short entry...

heyy wazzup.....another early post cos like ytd haf to go to tuition at nite n blahblahblah....haiz...sick again some more muz go do tuition hmwrk later abt 11 star questions havent even do yet..die lar...tired sial...tml dun tink can go soccer training..die....eh mr benson lee called me say 2E dos hu havent handed in maths file muz hand in by tml..dat includes me...haha wanted to hand in last monday bt lazy lar...boring la today nthn to do...i tink skool days is obviously betta den holidays...at the moment lar...haiz..gtg..Bye

today is an early post by me cos later gotta go to stupid tuition all d way at pasir panjang at 7.45 come back ard 9.30 by that time my bro will b usin d com readi so cant come online.....neway today woke up at 9.30 n started sneezin like dunno wad until now..i tink i m sick...n gt training on monday some more...gonna die...juz finished doin tuition homewrk. last minute. do so much leh .left out some questions..haha hope dun get caught...today gt england n iceland...england gonna lose la, they suck!! bt they tok as if dey damn good stupid country..france gonna win d whole euro 2004...gtg...ciaoz

wazzzup peepz.....mani thx to yixuan for helpin me do the stupid tagboard thinggy...so confusin sial....din noe she so helpful alos..hehe juz jkin....aiyah today normal day lar...nthn special....woke up at abt 6.30...go temple....come hm on d com play game....den fren call ask to play soccer at dunno where bt i culdnt..wasted...bt in d end played dwnstairs my house here...wif hpyo all....power la today whack until duno where all..haha..nonsense...den accidentally whack my frend he kena nicely sial so pain hehe..SORRI....aiyah nthn much to say liao la...2nd day bloggin nt bad ah...muz support dis blog ah....

wad a day....nonsense sial...wake up at 8 am happily tinking i was stilll early for d stupid science centre trip....BUT I WASNT....stupid hpyo paing call me at 8.33 am say muz b in skool NOW....luckily i bathed readi den faster go get readi all den met ariffin downstairs both take cap den stupid cab driver cant tok proper eng feel like whackin him upp..pay him run out of d stupid cab den d stupid ppl stilll havent leave...HENG AH.... den go to science centre...learn abt DNA....nthn special..den on d way home met bc den told us( i yong gs hpyopaing n terry) how to get to the mrt station..den reach home 5.00 la.....datz all....quite a tiring day lar...

heyz. i m finally bloggin again..been bz lar dor dunno hw long..todae was cross country....ran n ran n ran i hate the jungle part bt it was over quite fast lar..den on to the expressway..daz d good part..ran betta den in d jungle..den last 200m lidat turning into the carpark there sprint all d way to the finish n got 67th position..nt bad wad at least top half..den after dat my leg was extremely pain i cant tahan it n now also it is i dunno wad happen to the bone inside its swollen big time man..i realli can tahan dis....neway..gtg..CiAoZ

yoyoz i m back......todae quite a fun bt tiring day..firstly came to skool den gt dunno wad science practical lar so stupid sial d boshu dunno hw to tie some kind of tube den whole experiment wrong..den pe played soccer we won 2A 3-1 i scored one chia hon scored the other two..we played well..den after skool gt idp meeting den after dat gt soccer..soccer run around the field 5 times den play crossing passing n shooting..den after dat saw all my classmates in class still so i went in also n started our own drama fest..my class was like acting like siao...wif me d lead actor.HAHA funni sial..den did some other things lar...my chest veri pain now n my legs also i haf been nt getting enuff rest lately..neway..gtg readi..CiAoZ

hi juz came back from a tiring match..weather was killer man..we lost 2-0..not bad readi lor we expected to lose 5-0 or 6-0 dey very strong leh top of d table...yishun sec...so unlucky..mateen hit bar leh..den d second goal ah camillus try clear whack until so hard den accidentally hit zhishen head n go in sial..UNLUCKY..hehe den i had a small fight wif one guy dere...i whack his leg damn hard ah nv get the ball ah den that free kick i was markin him he come to me n elbow my chest..so pain leh...den i cleared off d line..lucki sial dat one...den so tiring second half all punchet readi sial so damn bloody hot all need water like wad lidat.....neway...yixuan if u r readin dis...u betta do d idp by tml ah..ifnot u die..no time liao lor dun play readi...gtg nwz..CiAoZ.

yo i m back..WENDY I M BLOGGIN!!!.....neway was sick ytd todae also still quite sick..todae go skool saw a dumb kitten in d class..i hate kittens n dere was one dere..stupid oni get rid of it fast....neway came home went to IMM..den go buy new bag all lar walk ard like dunno wad..betta den stayin at home n starin at d tv screen rite...den coming home time d taxi driver damn good sial a lady tokin on d fone all shoutin all den..she dunno how to drive sial..4th gear and she onli going 60km/h so lame rite...4th gear shld b at 80 liao eh..stupid woman dunnno doing wad sial..i tink my sister can drive much much betta den her man..tml gt punjabi..n tuition..aiyah tired lar..my dad's still in aussie..hope he's having a nice time..says its cold over there...he comes home late n sleeps earli...eat dunno wad..he misses here..n its not even one week...he has to stay dere for three weeks its a detachment...for work wan..kkz lar go liao...happi liao wendy???..CiAoZ

i Hate this..i simply hate dis...everyone wishes us good luck..IF ONI WE HAVE IT MAN...cheecken sial lose todae to northland 3-0..kp lar 4 npcc ppl cant play all first team some more den two ppl injured, 6 out of 11 ppl nv play full match..HOW lidat??..den camillus shoot one go juz over syed shoot one go juz over i shoot one hit bar..WAD IS DIS?????!?!?!??! dis isnt fair man..we realli need d damn bloody luck..where izz d luck??newtown, jesh team , also lost 2-1 dey put up a gd fight...aiyah dunno lar wads happenin to our team our whole season has been like dat man no luck at all..wadeva lar i not trying to make up excuses ok..iz juz lidat...kkz.. tired now ah pity zhishen he play so well den kena injured like wad man..ppl step on him leh..dey tnink dis wan wad stampede ah..idiots..hope u r alrite zs..kkz gtg liao..CiAoZ

wazzzup..i m finally back..kp so long havent blog readi sial..1 week..haha neway it was a boring week daz y got nthn to blog..alamak thursday was a miserable day..dun wanna tok abt it..tml again gt smthn..haiz give up lar..confirm gonna b same thing as thursday no need say liao..nvm i will try my best..neway..ytd go punjabi skool got some kind of exam.again.stupid oni..den after dat went to tuition..funnii sial all d ppl dere all makin jokes got one guy tok too much kena pay 4 bucks..nonsense den one guy kena 7 bucks..stupid ppl la all so rich one so can pay lar make noise like siao lidat..haiz..tml ppl got oral bt mine postponed..lucki..good luck to all dose takin oral...haha..chia hon n bc ask me whether wan go watch movie todae anot bt so little ppl dun wan lar oni 2 of dem leh..so pathetic rite?..neway nthn much to say liao..lez c wad happens tml...CiAoZ

yoyoyo..back after a long break..long break cos everyday nv do nethn so dun waste my time writing donw my daily routines..neway todae go back skl..den mdm ros nv come den i n ari creatin some sort of rhyme abt her n d class..lame..den during recess we supposed to change for pe den i n ari go diff toilet ah den we took diff shirts along too..den i went all ard d whole skl lookin for him den whn i found him he dun wan take out d shirt which is mine he say is damn nice...den i force him take out...den after skl got my soccer jersey number, 6, ok lar bt i prefer 3 my last time wan..den went for eldds alot of drama there also.den go home ard 6.30..daz it lar

wazzup..long day sial todae..woke up at 6.30 go eldds den after eldds went to tiong wif yong liang n guo hong go ljs eat den my shoelace tear so buy new one..den went back skl den go to d stadium..go there as usual wait for so damn long..den we went it abt 2.00 den wait all d way until 4 for d thing to start..was damn nice man..d choir were good...d skydivers were d nicest n d band one also nice..nt bad ah..den d most thing happen oni after d dumb thing finish..we waited juz outside d stadium frm abt 7 to 8.30...ok so first we were sitting outside ah damn long den vinod ruiyu ari n i were rite at d back of d class ah..torturing each other..passin ard ah vinod whack me den whack others den all three of d others gang up n started to PLUCK MY HAIR..i had to do some somersaults to go away frm dem..den in d end still kena whack..den go tok to rickie all..den pull budi hair also cos i nt happi wif him..dun like his face so pull some hair..haha..den waiting frm d bus all start fightin cos all cant tahan liao..chia hon keep pinchin me den not pain bt whn i pinch him damn pain den yong gs archie vinod ari ruiyu all at d back of d line trying to copy the rock..haha damn funni sial den in d bus shuting was practically squashed by d other girls cos we wanted shu ting to say d rock's line ah..den she dun wan she go hide den d others all squash her like siao den all create havoc sial vinod crawl under d chairs to try to spot shuting all nonsense lar vinod..den in d end she nv came out haha..funni sial all so noisy inside den went to tiong after dat eat dinner den met khalish all hpyo paing all den come home lor...daz it..CiAoZ

2dae again was raining bt lucki dis time d rain started whn i reached skool den continued all d way untile pe time n we ended up doing pe in d hall do some dumb skippin all lar den nv eat durin recess all den all d way until after skool nv eat..todae idp terok sial..toked to mr lee personallly he explained to me wad to do n all dat lar..mani thx to him..nw all i need is my members cooperation..mr lee said we r in a dangerous position liao oni 4 weeks left n we needa get a good job done...haiz dunno wad i gonna do lar i haf so mani things to do..die liao le lar..n wif grp members like mine ah..dunwan say lar...dunno wad to say todae soccer training was cancelled n all lar...nthn to say liao..CiAoZ

hiz..back to bloggin ...haha nth n much has been happening ..except ytd...d match against choa chu kang...solid man...we were like 3-0 dwn in juz 15 mins leh...all no mood to play whn u losin n worst still losin 3-0..HOWEVA.....we made a magnifico come back....kkz firstly we started playin very very well n camillus scored for us to make d score 3-1...den we kept on attackin...n mateen scored..3-2.. den dey attacked us too..bt we held on....den camillus attack again..n scored..3-3...Half time was 3-3...so far a solid performance..second half..dey attack us like dunno wad lidat..bt our defence was quite good...matthew our goalkeeper solid making two solid saves..den camillus cld haf scored d winner his shot juz juz wide man last minute curl away den syed free kick juz over d bar..we held on..AT LEAST WE DIN LOSE DIS TIME....n our performance was solid..although we were losin 3-0 we came back we din give up..it is very hard to dat cos ur morale readi so low..bt we did it..hope we can build on dis..atleast get one win...haha..neway todae gt oral..took it ..ok lar nt bad....den todae gt some kind of misunderstanding between mr kuan n sandy n me abt my soccer ball..haiz....hope i can have it cos its realli mine....neway gtg..ciaoz
